comingSoonPage.title: Our campaign is launching soon!
comingSoonPage.subtitle: In the meantime, you can support our campaign by donating below.

homePage.callToActionText: Join us in making a difference.
homePage.issuesMessage: I am running to bring Justice, Transparency, and Efficiency to our JP court. The west side of our county deserves better.
homePage.aboutMeMessage: I have served Bell County for many years and will it will always be my home. Read my story here.
homePage.endorsementsMessage: Making a better Bell County requires support from our community. I am humbled by the support I have received.
homePage.donateMessage: I can't do this alone. I need your support to win this election and bring positive change to our community.

issueSections.title: Justice
issueSections.description: Justice is swift and justice is fair. I will use my experience working in JP court and as your Truancy Master to balance deterrence and rehabilitation as we make our streets safer.

issueSections.title: Transparency
issueSections.description: A JP court should not be an uncertain or random place. Predictability and consistency in rulings allows people to solve problems before they even reach the court. I will always give a thorough reasoning for the decisions I make so we can increase confidence in our court again

issueSections.title: Efficiency
issueSections.description: This community deserves a full-time judge for a full-time job. That means being a judge who handles every duty of the officeâ€”from signing warrants and conducting magistration to performing inquests at a moment's notice.

aboutPage.bioParagraph1:
Bea Cox is a dedicated public servant with a passion for community development and effective governance. With a background in business and a commitment to fiscal responsibility, Bea brings a wealth of experience to the table. She is a strong advocate for transparency and accountability in government, and she is committed to working with residents, business leaders, and community organizations to create a better future for our county.

Throughout her career, Bea has been actively involved in numerous local initiatives, from supporting small businesses to improving public infrastructure. She believes in a common-sense approach to problem-solving and is dedicated to ensuring that the voices of all residents are heard. Her vision for the county is one of a smart growth, economic prosperity, and a high quality of life for all.

As a wife and mother, Bea understands the importance of building a strong and vibrant community for future generations. She is a firm believer in the power of collaboration and is committed to working with residents, business leaders, and community organizations to create a better future for our county.
aboutPage.bioParagraph2: This is a placeholder for the second paragraph of the bio. It will be placed between the double picture and the single picture.
aboutPage.bioParagraph3: This is a placeholder for the third paragraph of the bio. It will be placed after the single picture.

endorsementsPage.title: Endorsed by Leaders and the Community

endorsements.name: Mack Latimer
endorsements.quote: Bea Cox is the Person we need in JP 4. She has the temperment, experience, and work ethic to turn that office around.

endorsements.name: Tyler Rayner
endorsements.quote: Bea Cox is a truly good person who will focus of finding justice in every situation
